long_description: Gear up to take on the routes around Clear Creek Canyon, Colorado with this detailed and well-illustrated climbing guide. Author: Darren Mabe. Softcover: 191 pages; color photographs and maps. Sharp End Publishing; copyright 2008. Color-coded sections present climbs in each geographical grouping around Clear Creek Canyon. Section overview, detail and individual climb maps help orient you to the targeted climb; illustrated photographs chart your route up the wall. Guide provides all essential information and then some: season, access, length, difficulty and surrounding points of interest.
short_description: Gear up to take on the routes around Clear Creek Canyon, Colorado with this detailed and well-illustrated climbing guide.
